mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatting_content ( chatting_id, member_id, chatting_content, chatting_content_time ) VALUES ( #{chattingId}, #{memberId}, #{chattingContent}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT cc.chatting_id, cc.member_id, cc.chatting_content, cc.remove_whether, cc.chatting_content_time, m.member_name, c.CHATTING_NAME FROM chatting_content cc join member m on cc.MEMBER_ID = m.member_id join CHATTING c on cc.CHATTING_ID = c.CHATTING_ID where cc.CHATTING_ID = #{chattingId} and remove_whether is null order by chatting_content_time
